summary: The script reads one or more TTS manifest files, extracts the speaker identifiers from each entry, assigns a unique integer index to every distinct speaker, and writes this speaker-to-index mapping to a JSON file for use in multi‑speaker TTS model training.
business_intent: Enable seamless preparation of multi‑speaker text‑to‑speech training data by generating a consistent speaker index map across multiple datasets, simplifying downstream model configuration and training pipelines.
